name: Xiao-xuan Pan
title: About Me
description: I have about one year of front-end development experience. I am currently working as a front-end intern at Xinya Network Company. I have been involved in everything from small personal projects to large-scale commercial cases. I understand how to make a complete web page through front-end tools HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and React. I also have basic back-end knowledge such as server creation and database operation, and can connect APIs to front-end and back-end data. In addition, I have accumulated a lot of experience in communicating with PM and back-end developers to solve problems at work.
